00014 #ifndef XMLTOOL_NODEITERATOR_H
00015 #define XMLTOOL_NODEITERATOR_H
00016 
00017 #include <dom/DOM.hpp>
00018 #include <iterator>
00019 
00020 #if (XERCES_VERSION_MAJOR == 2 && XERCES_VERSION_MINOR >= 4) || (XERCES_VERSION_MAJOR > 2)
00021 using namespace xercesc;
00022 #endif
00023 
00024 namespace XMLTool {
00025 
00051 template <DOMNode::NodeType Type, typename PtrType>
00052 class NodeIterator: public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag, PtrType*> {
00053 public:
00054    typedef PtrType* Ptr;
00055 
00056    NodeIterator():m_node( NULL ) { }
00057 
00058    explicit NodeIterator( Ptr node ):
00059       m_node( node ) {
00060       while ( m_node && m_node->getNodeType() != Type ) {
00061          m_node = m_node->getNextSibling();
00062       }
00063    }
00064 
00069    NodeIterator<Type, PtrType>& operator ++() {
00070       nextElement();
00071       return *this;
00072    }
00073 
00078    NodeIterator<Type, PtrType> operator ++(int) {
00079       NodeIterator<Type, PtrType> oldValue( *this );
00080       nextElement();
00081       return oldValue;
00082    }
00083 
00085    Ptr operator ->() const {
00086       return m_node;
00087    }
00089    Ptr operator *() const {
00090       return m_node;
00091    }
00092 
00093    bool operator == ( const NodeIterator<Type, PtrType>& other ) const {
00094       return other.m_node == m_node;
00095    }
00096 
00097    bool operator != ( const NodeIterator<Type, PtrType>& other ) const {
00098       return ! ( *this == other );
00099    }
00100 
00101 private:
00102    void nextElement() {
00103       do {
00104          m_node = m_node->getNextSibling();
00105       } while ( m_node && m_node->getNodeType() != Type );
00106    }
00107 
00108    Ptr m_node;
00109 };
00110 
00112 typedef NodeIterator<DOMNode::ELEMENT_NODE, DOMNode> ElementIterator;
00114 typedef NodeIterator<DOMNode::ELEMENT_NODE, const DOMNode> ElementConstIterator;
00115 
00116 
00117 }

00119 #endif // XMLTOOL_NODEITERATOR_H
